org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.authn.core

Class LoginConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.authn.core.LoginConfiguration

  • public class LoginConfiguration
extends Object
    Contains all the configuration required to start or continue a login process.

      • indexValue

        public LoginConfiguration indexValue(String indexValue)
        Sets the Authentication Index value to use in the login process.

        Also checks to see if the AuthIndexType is COMPOSITE and if it is will add another parameter to the request with the same indexValue but using the legacy key "sunamcompositeadvice". This then allows composite advices to work correctly.

        Parameters:
        indexValue - The Authentication Index value.
        Returns:
        This LoginConfiguration object.

      • getIndexValue

        public String getIndexValue()
        Returns the Authentication Index value to use in the login process.
        Returns:
        The Authentication Index value.

      • sessionId

        public LoginConfiguration sessionId(String sessionId)
        Sets the session id of the current login process. Must not be set on the start of a login process, i.e. the first authenticate request, and on subsequent requests must be set with the session id returned from the previous authentication request. Must NOT be used for a user's current session, i.e. for session upgrade authentication requests.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - The session id of the current login process.
        Returns:
        This LoginConfiguration object.

      • getSessionId

        public String getSessionId()
        Returns the session id for the current login process. Must not be set on the start of a login process, i.e. the first authenticate request, and on subsequent requests must be set with the session id returned from the previous authentication request.
        Returns:
        The session id of the current login process.

      • sessionUpgrade

        public LoginConfiguration sessionUpgrade(String ssoTokenId)
        Sets the user's current session SSO Token Id to use in session upgrade.
        Parameters:
        ssoTokenId - The SSO Token Id of the user's current session.
        Returns:
        This LoginConfiguration object.

      • forceAuth

        public LoginConfiguration forceAuth(String forceAuthReqParam)
        Sets the request's ForceAuth parameter.
        Parameters:
        forceAuthReqParam - Parameter from the request
        Returns:
        This LoginConfiguration object.

      • isForceAuth

        public boolean isForceAuth()
        Returns if this login configuration has ForceAuth enabled.
        Returns:
        This login configuration's ForceAuth setting.

      • isSessionUpgradeRequest

        public boolean isSessionUpgradeRequest()
        Determines if the login request is requesting the user's current session to be upgraded.
        Returns:
        If the SSO Token Id of the user's current session is provided and not null or empter string then true is returned, otherwise false.

      • getSSOTokenId

        public String getSSOTokenId()
        Returns the SSO Token Id used to configure the login process, of the user's current session.
        Returns:
        The SSO Token Id of the user's current session.
